author: Sruthisagar Yamunan
text:
Welcoming the decision of DMDK president Vijayakant to contest the upcoming Assembly elections alone, convener of People’s Welfare Front (PWF) and MDMK general secretary, Vaiko, on Thursday said the announcement has “demolished the day dreams” of a few who tried to use DMDK to capture power.

“In one stroke, Mr. Vijayakant has vanquished the air castles that some had built. They thought that they could use DMDK to get power,” said Mr. Vaiko.

On Mr. Vijayakant’s wife Premalatha’s invitation to like-minded parties to approach the DMDK for an alliance, Mr. Vaiko said it was a “positive move”.

“She said their aim was to chase away the AIADMK and the DMK from Tamil Nadu. This is our motto as well,” he said and added that the PWF would take its steps very carefully.

‘Announcement has demolished the day dreams of a few who tried to use DMDK to capture power’
title: Vaiko welcomes Vijayakant’s decision
